name.en: Listening Comprehension of Chinese Broadcasting and TV News

remark.en: Course level:intermediate to high. Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade. The lecturer reserves the right to withdraw students absent for the first 2 classes.
remark.ch: 限華語程度為中高級之外籍生及僑生。一、第一次上課未出席，需事先跟老師請假，否則扣學期總成績。二、前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。

goal.en: On successful completion of this course, students will be able to 1. generally comprehend short audio news 2. grasp the main idea and outline of long short audio news 3. build up the ability of extracting the main meaning and keywords of a piece of news 4. understand and apply the common news terms and vocabulary to relevant topics
goal.ch: 修完本課程，學生應能: 1. 大致理解短篇口播新聞內容 2. 掌握中篇口播新聞主旨與大綱，並能以口語簡述摘要 3. 具有提取新聞關鍵詞與大意之能力 4. 了解及應用相關主題的常見新聞用語與詞彙

The class time will be part used for lecturing and most for student activities, including preview assignments, and in-class listening comprehension and discussion. Students are required to do the preview assignment and complete the assigned homework. Quizzes will be held after every unit.
